subject: Hopman Cup (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Victoria Azarenka opened her 2013 season with a win to advance to the Brisbane International quarterfinals. Bernard Tomic upset top-ranked Novak Djokovic at the Hopman Cup.
snippet: Top-ranked Victoria Azarenka opened her 2013 season with a win to advance to the Brisbane International quarterfinals. Bernard Tomic upset top-ranked Novak Djokovic at the Hopman Cup.
